channel.title: Comments on: An Emotional Danny Boy

item.title: By: Beth
item.dc:creator: Beth
item.description: Excellent!!!!!! By the way, I actually did kiss the Blarney stone last summer, though I don't think I could ever top this!
item.content:encoded: Excellent!!!!!! By the way, I actually did kiss the Blarney stone last summer, though I don’t think I could ever top this!

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
@Deane -
I wasn't kidding about the tears, the first time I saw this I was laughing so hard I was crying.
item.content:encoded:
@Deane –

I wasn’t kidding about the tears, the first time I saw this I was laughing so hard I was crying.

item.title: By: Deane
item.dc:creator: Deane
item.description: In complete seriousness, that was probably the funniest thing I've seen all year.
item.content:encoded: In complete seriousness, that was probably the funniest thing I’ve seen all year.
